DOC.brief_summary: Quantitative Genioglossal muscle strength Obstructive Sleep Apnea ( OSAS ) define clinical spectrum subject Snoring Disturbance , Oral Appliance Therapy Responsive , CPAP Responsive
DOC.detailed_description: To describe statistical analysis normal distribution domain genioglossus muscle strength four clinical stage Sleep Apnea ; , regression analysis , explore possibility inverse relationship decrease genioglossus strength progression clinical stage OSAS . 1.3 . To test hypothesis `` subpopulation subject '' exists within clinical spectrum OSAS , decrease strength genioglossus muscle may represent common element spite differ possible pathophysiologic pathway lead Obstructive Sleep Apnea man . 1.4 . The major hypothesis proposal thus `` Genioglossal Strength inversely correlate Obstructive Sleep Apnea Pathology . ''
DOC.criteria: Age 2040 year inclusive BMI 1825 Nonsmoking history current use minimum 6 month No smokeless tobacco product ( include ecigarettes ) minimum 6 month No sleep snoring report subject bedroom `` companion '' Selfdescribed active/athletic ( i.e . regular hike , walk , jogging , run , active Sports , volleyball , soccer , etc . ) Selfdescribed healthy , known disease recent illness Selfcompleted Epworth Sleepiness Scale < 6 ( Johns , MW , A new method Measuring daytime sleepiness : Epworth Sleepiness Scale ; SLEEP 14:4505 , 1991 ) . Physical Examination Mallampati Score Class 1 ( Nuckton , TJ , et al : Physical Examination : Mallampati Score Independent Predictor OSAS ; SLEEP 29 : 903908 , 2006 ) .
